Oh Hey,

OVERVIEW

Creative Web Developer based in Columbus, Ohio. I enjoy building and designing modern web apps that serve a purpose. From effective E-Commerce Websites to small useful Web Applications, I love building for the web!
The point is not to know everything but to always be improving and willing to take on challenges and learn new things.

SKILLS

React, WebPack, Parcel, SASS,

JQuery, GSAP, GIT, Node, NPM,

VS Code, Github, Adobe Suit

{ XD, Photoshop, Illustrator }

Work Environment

Effective Written and Verbal Communications

Strong Collaboration and Team Building

Quick Problem Solving

Accurate translation of design mockups to live websites

UI / UX Centric

Graphic Design / Web Design Background

Quick to learn and implement new concepts

Excellent Googler

FREETIME

Outside of work you can find me at the gym getting a lift in, hitting the mountain bike trails, spending time with friends and family or cooking up some good food.

I also enjoy learning about different fields such as the economy, health and fitness, investing, and self development. There is always room to grow and improve!


I am a go getter, self motivated and find satisfaction contributing to projects and ideas that are bigger than me.
